author: rbb
msg: Remove the APACHE_RELEASE macro.  We never use it in the code, and it
makes automating releases harder, because it is one more number to bump.

author: stoddard
msg: Fix Windows compile break caused by move of error_bucket.c

author: rbb
msg: Fix a compile break on OS/2, by adding apr_general.h back to httpd.h.

author: rbb
msg: Add a note about the lack of threads on FreeBSD to the INSTALL file.

author: rbb
msg: Don't assume that the byterange filter will always be called more than
once.  It is perfectly legal to call the byterange filter one time,
with all the data.  Without this patch, that case will seg fault.
